attributes.action: Make 1 MP accompany and fight alongside every 1,000 UK troops sent to war
attributes.additional_details:
In line with the ancient honourable tradition that our Rulers accompany their troops into battle when fighting a war, this petition seeks that 1 MP (chosen by random means from those MPs voting in favour of military action ) must accompany and fight alongside every 1,000 troops commited to war.
This proposal will ensure that UK MPs voting to put UK troops in harm's way do so with the conviction that they themselves are willing to lay down their own life for that same cause.
